Anubis/Koga Shuko/Hades/Scattershot/Unitron:

::Anubis cursed in ancient Egyptian, turning around, firing off a few plasma 
blasts at Bloodstryke::

::Koga Shuko fired a missile off at the Alliance base::

::Unitron fired a missile at the Alliance base, then a few optic blasts off 
at Perndabot's lower torso::

::Hades fired off a few laser blasts off at DevilDuer from his rifle, firing 
a missile off at the Alliance base::

::Scattershot laughed manically, transforming to his robot mode, hovering in 
the air, raising his machine gun, firing off a dozen explosive bullets 
randomly at DevilDuer and Perndabot::
